snippet: Shares of BTG Pactual's offering are to be priced at $15.71 to $18.44 a share, with trading scheduled to start in both São Paulo and Amsterdam on April 26.
abstract: Shares of BTG Pactual's offering are to be priced at $15.71 to $18.44 a share, with trading scheduled to start in both São Paulo and Amsterdam on April 26.

headline.main: The 'Goldman' of Brazil Is Aiming to Raise $2.24 Billion in an I.P.O.
